chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (cA m k z) /\ exd m (cA_1 m k z)

Premises:
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
cA_1 = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
cA = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
dart = nat : Set
exd_A_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (A m k z) -> exd m z
exd_A_1_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (A_1 m k z) -> exd m z
pred_exd_A_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> exd m (A_1 m k z)
succ_exd_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m (A m k z)
succ_pred_clos : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k z <> nil /\ cA_1 m k z <> nil
pred_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> exd m z
succ_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m z
not_exd_A_nil : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> A m k z = nil
not_exd_A_1_nil : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> A_1 m k z = nil
A_A_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> A m k (A_1 m k z) = z
A_1_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> A_1 m k (A m k z) = z
exd_not_nil : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> z <> nil
prec_L = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart) => exd m x /\ exd m y /\ ~ succ m k x /\ ~ pred m k y /\ cA m k x <> y : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> Prop
succ_dec : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), {succ m k x} + {~ succ m k x}
pred_dec : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), {pred m k x} + {~ pred m k x}
not_exd_nil : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m nil
exd_dec : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), {exd m x} + {~ exd m x}
A_nil : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim), inv_hmap m -> A m k nil = nil
A_1_nil : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim), inv_hmap m -> A_1 m k nil = nil
prec_I = fun (m : fmap) (x : dart) => x <> nil /\ ~ exd m x : fmap -> dart -> Prop
inj_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim), inv_hmap m -> inj_dart (succ m k) (A m k)
inj_A_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim), inv_hmap m -> inj_dart (pred m k) (A_1 m k)
succ = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) => A m k x <> nil : fmap -> dim -> dart -> Prop
pred = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) => A_1 m k x <> nil : fmap -> dim -> dart -> Prop
Nat.lt_exists_pred : forall z n : nat, (z < n)%nat -> exists k : nat, n = S k /\ (z <= k)%nat
A = fix A (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 _ _ _ => A m0 k x | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then y0 else A m0 k x else A m0 k x end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
A_1 = fix A_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (y : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 _ _ _ => A_1 m0 k y | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y0 y then x0 else A_1 m0 k y else A_1 m0 k y end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
Pos.max_spec : forall n m : positive, (n < m)%positive /\ Pos.max n m = m \/ (m <= n)%positive /\ Pos.max n m = n
B_1 = fix B_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (y : dart) {struct m} : fmap := match m with | V => V | I m0 x0 t0 p0 => I (B_1 m0 k y) x0 t0 p0 | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y0 y then m0 else L (B_1 m0 k y) k0 x0 y0 else L (B_1 m0 k y) k0 x0 y0 end : fmap...
B = fix B (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : fmap := match m with | V => V | I m0 x0 t0 p0 => I (B m0 k x) x0 t0 p0 | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then m0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> fmap
ARmul_assoc1 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul (rmul x y) z) (rmul (rmul y z) x)
ARmul_assoc2 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul (rmul y x) z) (rmul (rmul y z) x)
Nat.min_r : forall n m : nat, (m <= n)%nat -> Nat.min n m = m
Nat.max_l : forall n m : nat, (m <= n)%nat -> Nat.max n m = n
ARmul_assoc : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z)
N.shiftl_spec_low : forall a n m : N, (m < n)%N -> N.testbit (N.shiftl a n) m = false
sigma_split : forall (f : nat -> R) (low high k : nat), (low <= k)%nat -> (k < high)%nat -> sigma f low high = (sigma f low k + sigma f (S k) high)%R
leb_complete : forall m n : nat, (m <=? n)%nat = true -> (m <= n)%nat
Record SOR (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop) : Prop := mk_SOR_theory { SORsetoid : Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req; SORplus_wd : forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> forall y1 y2 : R, req y1 y2 -> req (rplus x1 y1) (rplus x2 y2); SORtimes_wd : forall...
Init.Nat.sub = fix sub (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0%nat => n | S k => match m with | 0%nat => n | S l => sub k l end end : nat -> nat -> nat Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope]

```coq
intros m k z Hinv Hexd.
split.
- apply exd_A_exd with k z; auto.
- apply exd_A_1_exd with k z; auto.
Qed.
```
